properties.media:imagetext:
COCKTAILS
Heublein Manhattan Beefeater Martini
Harveys Bristol Cream Sherry
Campari
Screwdriver
Mr. and Mrs.
"T*® Bloody Mary
Smirnoff Silver Vodka Martini
Boccie Ball with Amaretto di Saronno,
Orange Juice and Club Soda
SPIRITS
Jack Daniels
I.W. Harper Seagram's V.O.
Old Grandad
Johnnie Walker Red Label
Chivas Regal
Beefeater Gin
Smirnoff Silver Vodka
Bacardi Rum
Remy Martin V.S.O.P. and Soda
LIQUEURS
Remy Martin V.SO.P. Cognac
Amaretto di Saronno Carolans Irish Cream
The above drinks are available at
$2.50 each
Selected Beers $1.50
WINES & CHAMPAGNE
TWA has selected these fine beverages.
Champagne $3.50 Wine $2.50
CHAMPAONI
Lauren it Perrier
SOAVE
BOLLA
ORDIER
LABOTTIERE
Your flight includes a selection from TWA's
American Harvest Service which features
seasonal foods and regional cooking of the
United States. We pay tribute to American
cuisine by including some recipe ideas from
TWA cities and from the American Harvest
Restaurants in the Vista International Hotels.
SALAD
Marinated Garden Salad in Season.
ENTREE SELECTION
FILET TIPS DIJONNAISE
Tidbits of Beef Tenderloin are Lightly
Sauteed then Blended in a Sauce of Beef
Stock, Herbs, Cream and a Touch of Dijon
Mustard. Served with Fresh Buttered
Fettuccine and Petits Pois.
CHICKEN HARVESTER
Chicken Breast in a Cream Sauce
with Corn and Carrots.
Presented with Rice and Green Beans.
Please accept our apologies if due to previous passenger
vour entree preterence is not available
DESSERT
Chocolate Mousse
Dinner Chocolate
COFFEE FLAVORS OF THE WORLD
$3.50 Each
MILANO with Amaretto di Saronno
ROYALE with Remy Martin V.SO.P.
CAROLANS IRISH
TENNESSEE with Jack Daniels
FROM TWA's RECIPE FILES
CHICKEN HARVESTER
Yield: 8 portions
Boneless Breast of Chicken. Salt.
White Pepper, Melted Butter
SAUCO
Can Creamed Com
3 Cut.
Chicken Bouillon Cube
Smal Carrots Shredded
tOSD.
1 pinch
Dinch
Sign.
To mage
Ground thyme
Ground Bay enves
Ground
Sage
Parsley Hakes
Salt and White Pepper
PROCEDURE:
Season chicken breast with salt and seoser: baste with
melted butter; place on buttered sheet pan; bake in
850°E. preheated oven until done (baste frequently
seith the dripping to avoid dryness)
Combine all the sauce ingredients except cornstarch
mixture and the shredded carrots in a sauce pan.
Bring to a boil over medium heat stirring occasional-
ly; simmer for 10
Add cornstarch mixture slowly to sauce pan, stirring
constantly. Bring back to a boil. Adjust seasoning.
Aed halt of the Shredded
mer for 5 minutes: remove from neat.
BEVERAGES
MAXWELL HOUSE COFFEE
Lipton. tea
Milk
Juice
CocaCola. PEPSI-COLA
diet Coke.
diet pepsis diet
COUNTRY TIME
LEMONADE FLAVOR W
Soft drinks are with the Captain's
compliments.
PRIOR TO ARRIVAL
Devonshire Scone with Strawberry
Jam Clotted Cream and Apple Juice
will be served.
